amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 118-456 to require the FBI to report to Congress on a quarterly basis the number of U.S. person queries conducted and permits Congressional leadership to attend Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Court proceedings.
amendment.purpose: Amendment requires the FBI to report to Congress on a quarterly basis the number of U.S. person queries conducted and permits Congressional leadership to attend Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Court proceedings.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 269 - 153 (Roll no. 115).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 269 - 153 (Roll no. 115).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
